title: Amber Robe
summaries: The Amber Robe is an armor item that can be worn in the shirt slot. It is part of the Wizard set and is the second strongest type of gem robe, only being weaker than the Diamond Robe.

Wearing the <linked>Wizard Hat</linked> alongside the Amber Robe provides a set bonus of +10% magic <linked>critical strike chance</linked>, whereas wearing a <linked>Magic Hat</linked> alongside it provides a set bonus of +60 <linked>mana</linked>. Any leg-slot equipment can be worn with these set bonuses remaining intact.
